name: Thought Train
description:
You're inside the train of thoughts created from your mind. Find a way to survive and stop the train

Thought Train is a 2D side-scroller game with a concept about an overthinker who lost themself to the train of thoughts.  To stop the train they must go through each room and run through the obstacles. If they fail, "The End of The Line" will approach and their mind will fall into deeper thoughts.

This prototype is developed and submitted to Health Game Jam 2022

Controls

Move: Left and Right arrows -or- A and D

Jump: Space -or- W

Team members

Tonnam Somchanakij

Malita Pradhani
